product_name: 50 Hikes in the North Georgia Mountains
long_description: From the heights of Lookout Mountain, along the Blue Ridge and to the shores of the Chattooga River, this guide charts 50 spectacular hikes in the mountains north of Atlanta. Author: Johnny Molloy. Softcover; 245 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. The Countryman Press; copyright 2006. Hikes range in length from a 1.8 mi. ramble to a multiday backpacking trip and provide something for hikers of all abilities. Overview chart at the front of the book makes it easy to choose a hike based on mileage, overlooks, waterfalls, campgrounds and kid-friendly features. Each hike description includes a topographic map and at-a-glance information on mileage, difficulty rating, time, elevation and recommended USGS maps. Provides information on the geology, wildlife and history of each trail.
short_description: From the heights of Lookout Mountain, along the Blue Ridge and to the shores of the Chattooga River, this guide charts 50 spectacular hikes in the mountains north of Atlanta.
